name: Interact with the Throne and Junk

nodes.text: Oh, my Ermahgerd! This wretched pile is the Drat Queen's throne.
Well, if she doesn't see what a mess it is, I'm certainly not going to be the one to tell her.
It's her throne... made out of junk the Drats have stolen from who-knows-where. It's stomach-churning.
Even those shelves on the right are totally unpalletable!
The Drat Queen was using this pile of junk as her throne!
Finally! A worse housekeeper than Aeolus!
The Drat Queen's throne. And a more impressive pile of garbage one rarely sees...
... outside of my dorm room.
Tsk, tsk. This wretched pile is the Drat Queen's throne.
Well, if she doesn't see what a mess it is, I'm certainly not going to be the one to tell her.
It's her throne... made out of junk the Drats have stolen from who-knows-where. It's stomach-churning.
Even those shelves on the right are totally unpalletable!
Gah... the Drat Queen was using this pile of dreck as her throne!
Finally! A worse housekeeper than I am!
The Drat Queen's throne. And a more impressive pile of garbage one rarely sees...
... outside of my dorm room.
Any thought of raiding her nest should be put off 'til she's not right there to bite my arse off.
I think that would violate Rule 6.
I remember!
That won't end well.
Occupado.
There's so much junk here it could take forever to search through it...
But I do see some Full Heal potions - good thing she didn't get to use them while I was fighting her.
But I do see some Full Heal potions. Good thing I never had to fight her.
To think that there could be something valuable in all that garbage. Someday, some smart rogue will tear it apart piece by piece, and find something wonderful amid all the filth.
But not to-day.
I know she's not using it anymore. But there are probably a few thousand lice and ticks that would be happy to meet me.
It's not open for discussion. I'm not touching it. I would sooner put my arm through one of those grates in the floor, which is another thing I won't be doing.
